product_name: Von Zipper Elmore Sunglasses - Gnarr-Waiian Yellow Frames - Men's
long_description: The Von Zipper Elmore sunglasses combine style and performance, offering 100% UV protection, superb impact resistance and a hot splash of tropical color in the Gnarr-waiian design.
